thread.title: JYJ's Kim Junsu And Im Chang Jung To Release Collaboration Song | Soompi
thread.title_full: JYJ's Kim Junsu And Im Chang Jung To Release Collaboration Song | Soompi

author: C. Oh
title: JYJ's Kim Junsu And Im Chang Jung To Release Collaboration Song | Soompi
text:
Shares 224 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
On February 23, JYJ’s management agency, C-JeS Entertainment, announced that JYJ’s Kim Junsu and singer Im Chang Jung will be releasing a collaboration song. 
“Kim Junsu and Im Chang Jung recorded a new song together; however, we have not decided on an exact release date yet.” 
As the two are well known to be skilled vocalists, their combined talents are predicted to create a unique charm for their song. 
Meanwhile, JYJ’s Kim Junsu recently enlisted in the army , alongside BIGBANG’s T.O.P , likely making this his last song to his fans for a while.
